title: Why did Eddie Van Halen and Valerie divorce? - Quora

response.answer_text: According to both parties, Eddie and Val’s marriage was rough for a long time before they called it a day. There was rampant drug use and cheating on both sides and it went on for years. They probably made it last 26 years because as screwed up as their relationship was, they were/are both dedicated parents who love their son Wolfgang very much. They also managed to remain friends after the divorce and even attended each other’s second marriages.

Valerie and Eddie split up in 2001. They divorced in 2007. Valerie says Eddie's drinking was the main reason. She also says that they never connected during their marriage but loved him very much. Check out Van Halen Rising by Greg Renoff, it's a breakdown of their beginnings. RIP EDWARD VAN HALEN 💔🤟
